description:
Add bungee storage options to your kayak, canoe or SUP deck with these loops. Attach them to D-rings, deck lines or deck plugs.

  • 4 bungee loops made of ⅛in. shockcord with a parrel bead
  • Attaches to any D-ring, deck line or deck plug
  • Adjustable length
  • Stretches from 20 to 43 cm
name: North Water Universal Mounting Kit
